Name: Tanvi
Title: Had fun
Review: I came here with my family . My kids were very very Happy . We enjoyed to our fullest . Rides were amazing .

Name: kushBans
Title: For kids
Review: The rides here are not all for the adults. Kids in the family will enjoy the rides more. Rides are here for all.

Name: ayushagarwal022
Title: Fun masti and adventure
Review: Visited this amusement park along with family and we all enjoyed a lot. They have rides for people of all ages including kids

Name: Blitzkrieg3
Title: Good Amusement Park
Review: Dream World Amusement Park is a good place to spend a day out with your loved ones. it is a perfect setting for a family day out. The park has lovely rides and games. The staff is also very helpful. You can also savour some good food at the park. Overall, a very good place to visit.

Name: Adil Rashid
Title: awesome short ride
Review: lets have short prty then will be go and enjoy the water pool and many more ride include in ticket..

Name: Heather B
Title: Fun holiday day
Review: Happy to say that Dream world looks like  its on its way to becoming a great day for the family once again. There are a few rides still closed however the staff and cleanliness  of the park more than makesup for it.The park was looking tiered  however it appears that a lot if work behind the scenes  has been done and a lot of face lifts for the rides have been achieved.  The water park included  within the park also has great staff and is a whole lot of fun.Worth the day out.

Name: reenadivyaraj
Title: Nothing is there
Review: It is a worst place I have ever visited The food is very bad , no maintenance  , no cleanNo body should go that place

Name: P N M
Title: Excellent
Review: The place Of Dream world amusement park is very natural. This is the worth place for children. You can enjoy with groups as picnic spots . You can have lunch , snacks etc.at very reasonable rates. The security of park is up to the mark for children.

Name: credit356
Title: Excellent  theme park
Review: This   theme park in the LDA colony is  quite  far from the city. But  good  transport facility is available. The amusement  park has  got lot of items where everybody can enjoy . For all age groups , they have  special items. Good food is  available  at  reasonable  price

Name: Abhishek R
Title: New place for Dhamaal & Masti
Review: Good Rides, Nice Place, Huge Area, Good Food, Overall Happy. my kids enjoyed a lot specially train & Boating is awesome.
